DOC.brief_summary: The main objective of the study is to investigate the safety and efficacy of Optivate®, administered in appropriate dosage to present bleeding and achieve haemostasis in patients with Haemophilia A undergoing surgery.
DOC.brief_title: An Open Study to Investigate the Safety and Efficacy of Optivate® in Haemophilia A Patients Undergoing Surgery.
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed with Haemophilia A, at least 12 years of age, due to undergo surgery and have a lifetime exposure of at least 20 exposures to a FVIII concentrate.
